title: DOM (Diploma in Office Management)
description: This course covers essential office management skills, including MS-DOS, Windows, MS-Office suite, graphic design tools like CorelDRAW and Photoshop, accounting software such as Tally ERP 9, and networking fundamentals. It also includes hardware troubleshooting and software installation.

title: DCST (Diploma in Computer Science and Technology)
description: Gain expertise in programming languages like C, JavaScript, Python, and SQL. This course also covers HTML for web development, MS-Office tools, and essential computer fundamentals.

title: CAO (Certificate in Accounts Operation)
description: A focused course on accountancy and financial software, covering Tally ERP 9.0, FACT, and MS-Office applications for accounting operations.

title: DCA (Diploma in Computer Application)
description: Learn essential computer applications, including MS-DOS, Windows, MS-Office, Blue Java, HTML, and Internet usage, to build a strong foundation in computing.

title: CFA (Certificate in Financial Accounting)
description: This course provides a foundation in financial accounting, covering key concepts of accountancy and practical skills in Tally ERP 9.0 and MS-Office applications.

title: CCA (Certificate in Computer Application)
description: An introductory course covering essential computer applications such as MS-DOS, Windows, MS-Office, and basic Internet usage.

title: DCAP (Diploma in Computer Accounts Professional)
description: This course covers advanced accounting software, corporate banking, taxation, and professional accounting practices using Tally and Accord.

title: CDEO (Certificate in Data Entry Operator)
description: Learn the fundamentals of data entry operations, including MS-DOS, MS-Office tools, and basic Internet usage, to build proficiency in clerical tasks.

title: DCHE (Diploma in Computer Hardware Engineering)
description: This course provides in-depth knowledge of computer hardware, including motherboard, HDD, FDD, circuit drawing, software installation, and PC assembling.

title: CDTP (Certificate in Desktop Publishing)
description: Learn professional desktop publishing using CorelDRAW, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe PageMaker, and MS-Word to create visually appealing documents and designs.
